poly_title: Will Trump deport 750,000 or more people in 2025?
kalshi_title: How many deportations in Trump's first year? At least 750,000
reason: Both ask if deportations under Trump in 2025 will be at least 750,000, same threshold and time window.

kalshi_title: How many deportations in Trump's first year? At least 500,000
reason: Poly market asks about deportations between 500k-750k, Kalshi market asks if at least 500k, overlapping threshold and same time window, representing the same condition for 500k threshold.

kalshi_title: How many deportations in Trump's first year? At least 1,000,000
reason: Poly market asks about deportations between 1m-1.25m, Kalshi market asks if at least 1m, overlapping threshold and same time window, representing the same condition for 1m threshold.

poly_title: Will Trump deport 2,000,000 or more people?
kalshi_title: How many deportations in Trump's first year? At least 2,000,000
reason: Both ask if deportations under Trump in 2025 will be at least 2,000,000, same threshold and time window.

poly_title: Will Trump cut corporate taxes in 2025?
kalshi_title: Will the corporate tax be decreased before Jan 1, 2026? Yes
reason: Both ask if corporate taxes will be cut/decreased during 2025, same tax type and time window.

kalshi_title: Will Trump buy Greenland? During Trump's term
reason: Both ask if Trump will acquire/buy Greenland during his term, same asset and time window.

poly_title: Will Trump end the Federal Reserve before Jan 1, 2027?
kalshi_title: Will Trump end the Federal Reserve before Jan 1, 2027? Before Jan 1, 2027
reason: Exact same market question about ending the Federal Reserve before Jan 1, 2027.

poly_title: Will Trump veto a bill in 2025?
kalshi_title: Will Trump veto at least 1 bills before Jan 1, 2026? At least 1
reason: Both ask if Trump will veto at least one bill before Jan 1, 2026 (covering all of 2025).
